movies.title: Khorma, le crieur de nouvelles
movies.plot: Khorma is different! With his red hair and strangely pale complexion for a Tunisian, many people think he's retarded. Bou Khaled, his master, takes him under his wing nonetheless and teaches him the secrets of the business. Khorma learns to announce weddings, births and deaths in his neighborhood in Bizerte. But, one day, old Bou Khaled makes a grievous mistake: he announces a local woman's death rather than her daughter's marriage. Khorma is chosen to replace him...
movies.simplePlot: Khorma is different! With his red hair and strangely pale complexion for a Tunisian, many people think he's retarded. Bou Khaled, his master, takes him under his wing nonetheless and ...

biography.bio: Mohamed Graïaa is an actor, known for Bab'Aziz, le prince qui contemplait son âme (2005), Khorma, le crieur de nouvelles (2002) and The String (2009).
biography.name: Mohamed Graïaa

biography.bio: Mohamed Mourali is an actor, known for Khorma, le crieur de nouvelles (2002) and The Sultan of the City (1992).
biography.name: Mohamed Mourali

biography.bio: Ramzi Brari is an actor, known for Vivre au paradis (1998), Khorma, le crieur de nouvelles (2002) and Agatha Christie's Poirot (1989).
biography.name: Ramzi Brari

biography.placeOfBirth: Tunis, French Protectorate of Tunisia [now Tunisia]
biography.bio: Hassen Khalsi was born on September 8, 1931 in Tunis, French Protectorate of Tunisia. He was an actor, known for Wanderers of the Desert (1984), Khorma, le crieur de nouvelles (2002) and Redeyef 54 (1999). He died on April 9, 2007 in Tunis, Tunisia.
biography.name: Hassen Khalsi

biography.bio: Lazhari Sbaï is an actor, known for Khorma, le crieur de nouvelles (2002).
biography.name: Lazhari Sbaï

biography.bio: Dalila Meftahi is an actress, known for En face (1999), Day of the Falcon (2011) and The Wedding Song (2008).
biography.name: Dalila Meftahi

biography.bio: Dorra Zarrouk was born on January 13, 1980 in Tunis, Tunisia. She is an actress, known for Segn El Nessa (2014), Mesawar Qateel (2012) and Chaos, This Is (2007).
biography.name: Dorra Zarrouk

biography.bio: Tarek Zammouri is an actor, known for The Season of Men (2000), Khorma, le crieur de nouvelles (2002) and El paraíso ya no es lo que era (2001).
biography.name: Tarek Zammouri

biography.bio: Jamel Sassi is known for his work on Halfaouine: Boy of the Terraces (1990), Horra (2014) and Parfum de printemps (2016).
biography.name: Jamel Sassi

biography.bio: Chedly El Querghy is an actor, known for Khorma, le crieur de nouvelles (2002) and Tödliche Dienstreise (1994).
biography.name: Chedly El Querghy
